metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32435 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the function get_key in parse.c of abcm2ps v8.14.11 allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 7.8.9-1ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.8.9-1ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1').
